snippet: The N.B.A. put on a show in its first exhibition game in Africa — starting with a dunk straight from the tipoff by Luc Mbah a Moute.
abstract: Team World defeats Team Africa, 101-97, in NBA's first exhibition game in Africa.
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. put on a show in its first exhibition game in Africa — starting with a dunk straight from the tipoff by Luc Mbah a Moute.

headline.main: Players Shine in Exhibition Game in Africa
headline.print_headline: Stars (and Former Stars) Play in Africa
